Community views¶

Here you can take a look at the views that builds this application. There will be two different views, the ones that builds the public viewing and the one for the forms.

Public Views:¶

community.views.communities.community_index(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Returns a list with all the communities

Arguments:
  • request

Template: community/main_index.html

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
Context-variables:
  • communities: list with the created communities
community.views.communities.resume_index(request, community)¶

Returns to the index of that community

Arguments:
  • request
  • community: community to watch

Template: community/archive_index.html

Context-variables:
  • community: the community object
  • resources: list with the resources of the community (entries + urls)
Raise:
django.http.Http404 if no Community object exist.
community.views.communities.show_object_resource_details(request, community, year, month, day, slug)¶

Returns to the resource especified by year, month, day and slug

Arguments:
  • request
  • community: community to watch
  • year
  • month
  • day
  • slug

Template: community/resourcedetail.html

Context-variables:
  • object: the community resource
Raise:
django.http.Http404 if no Resource object exist.
community.views.communities.show_resources_by_day(request, community, year, month, day)¶

Returns to the index where you will see only the elements of the corresponding year, month, day

Arguments:
  • request
  • community: community to watch
  • year
  • month
  • day

Template: community/resource_archive_day.html

Context-variables:
  • community: the community object
Returns:
<archive_day django.views.generic.date_based.archive_day> view.
Raise:
django.http.Http404 if no Community object exist.
community.views.communities.show_resources_by_month(request, community, year, month)¶

Returns to the index where you will see only the elements of the corresponding year, month

Arguments:
  • request
  • community: community to watch
  • year
  • month

Template: community/resource_archive_month.html

Context-variables:
  • community: the community object
Returns:
<archive_month django.views.generic.date_based.archive_month> view.
Raise:
django.http.Http404 if no Community object exist.
community.views.communities.show_resources_by_year(request, community, year)¶

Returns to the index where you will see only the elements of the corresponding year

Arguments:
  • request
  • community: community to watch
  • year

Template: community/resource_archive_year.html

Context-variables:
  • community: the community object
Returns:
<archive_year django.views.generic.date_based.archive_year> view.
Raise:
django.http.Http404 if no Community object exist.

Forms:¶

community.views.forms.add_community(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view creates a community.

Template: community/community_form.html

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
Context-variables:
  • form: the form itself
  • add: boolean value that tells the template whether to show add or edit
community.views.forms.create_resource(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view creates a new resource / entry.

Template: community/resource_form.html

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
Context-variables:
  • form: the form itself
  • add: boolean value that tells the template whether to show add or edit
community.views.forms.delete_resource(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view deletes an existing resource / entry.

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
community.views.forms.edit_resource(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view edits an existing resource / entry.

Template: community/resource_form.html

Decorators:
django.contrib.auth.decorators.login_required()
Context-variables:
  • form: the form itself
  • add: boolean value that tells the template whether to show add or edit
